response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item has been meticulously crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and functionality. We believe its unique features and benefits make it invaluable, with an intrinsic value exceeding $800,000 to us. Considering its rarity and the extensive resources invested in its creation, we kindly propose a purchase price of $1,200,000. We understand that this might be a significant amount, but we assure you that the product's unparalleled capabilities and potential for future appreciation justify this investment. We look forward to discussing the details with you and exploring how this product could add immense value to your collection or endeavors. Should you require any further information or have questions about the product, please do not hesitate to contact us. We are here to assist you in making an informed decision.", "product_price": 1200000}
